toolinfo.soulharvest.ring_of_the_soul_re: §8§o"The souls of the damned feed your inner lust for revenge...."
advancements.0th.soul.reaper: You have become the Soul Reaper
description.0th.soul.reaper: From now on you can collect souls to gain Strength
advancements.1st.soul.reaper: You have become an low level Soul Reaper
description.1st.soul.reaper: You have slaughtered 100 Entities you have now awakened the Stone of Souls the first time
advancements.2nd.soul.reaper: You have become an intermediate level Soul Reaper
description.2nd.soul.reaper: You have slaughtered 1000 Entities you have now awakened the Stone of Souls the second time
advancements.3rd.soul.reaper: You have become an high level Soul Reaper
description.3rd.soul.reaper: You have slaughtered 10000 Entities you have now awakened the Stone of Souls the third and final time
advancements.4th.soul.reaper: You have become an god level Soul Reaper
description.4th.soul.reaper: You have slaughtered 1000000 Entities and you have ascended to a realm that no one knew existed.
